text_1: Computer programmers use programming languages to write, revise, test, and update code. This code allows computers, software, and applications to carry out tasks.
title_3: Is programming a popular field of work?
text_3: In a world that relies more and more on technology to make life more convenient, developers will always be in high demand. As senior programmers exit, the workforce, and mid-level engineers get promoted, and entry-level positions will continue to open up.
